statements: SELECT * FROM treaties WHERE signing_country = 'USA';
SELECT treaty_name, compliance_status FROM treaties WHERE signing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM treaties WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT treaty_name, signing_country FROM treaties ORDER BY signing_date DESC;
SELECT treaty_name, signing_country FROM treaties WHERE signing_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT treaty_name, signing_country FROM treaties ORDER BY signing_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT treaty_id, treaty_name, signing_country FROM treaties WHERE signing_country = 'USA'
SELECT treaty_name, signing_country, signing_date FROM treaties WHERE compliance_status = 'pending' ORDER BY signing_date LIMIT 5
SELECT treaty_id, signing_country FROM treaties WHERE signing_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY signing_date ASC
SELECT * FROM treaties WHERE compliance_status = 'compliant'
SELECT treaty_name, date_signed FROM treaty_agreements;
SELECT country_signatory, treaty_name FROM treaty_agreements WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT violation_details, date_occurred, resolution_status FROM human_rights_violations WHERE country_perpetrator = 'Country X';
SELECT treaty_name, country_signatory, date_signed FROM treaty_agreements ORDER BY date_signed DESC;
SELECT violation_details, reported_by FROM human_rights_violations WHERE resolution_status = false;
SELECT * FROM treaty_agreements WHERE treaty_id = 1;
SELECT treaty_name, country_signatory, date_signed FROM treaty_agreements WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT country_perpetrator, violation_details FROM human_rights_violations WHERE resolution_status = false;
SELECT treaty_name, country_signatory, date_signed FROM treaty_agreements WHERE treaty_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT violation_id, violation_details, country_perpetrator FROM human_rights_violations WHERE date_occurred > '2022-01-01';
SELECT treaty_id, treaty_name, country_signed, signing_date, compliance_status FROM treaties;
SELECT treaty_name, signing_date, country_signed, compliance_status, treaty_id FROM treaties;
SELECT signing_date, treaty_name, compliance_status, country_signed, treaty_id FROM treaties;
SELECT treaty_id, treaty_name FROM treaties;
SELECT treaty_name, signing_date FROM treaties;
SELECT * FROM treaties;
SELECT treaty_name, country_signed FROM treaties WHERE signing_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY signing_date DESC;
SELECT ts.signatory_name, ts.signatory_country, t.treaty_name FROM treaty_signatories ts JOIN treaties t ON ts.treaty_id = t.treaty_id;
SELECT t.treaty_name, ta.amendment_text, ta.amendment_date FROM treaties t JOIN treaty_amendments ta ON t.treaty_id = ta.treaty_id WHERE ta.amendment_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';

SELECT t.treaty_name, ts.signatory_name, ts.signatory_country FROM treaties t JOIN treaty_signatories ts ON t.treaty_id = ts.treaty_id WHERE t.compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY ts.signatory_country DESC;
SELECT * FROM treaties;
SELECT treaty_name, date_signed FROM treaties ORDER BY date_signed DESC;
SELECT treaty_name, signatory_countries FROM treaties WHERE human_rights_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT treaty_name, date_signed FROM treaties WHERE signatory_countries LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT treaty_name, signatory_countries FROM treaties WHERE date_signed BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM treaties WHERE id = 1;
SELECT treaty_name, signatory_countries FROM treaties WHERE human_rights_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM treaty_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT treaty_name, date_signed, human_rights_compliance FROM treaties WHERE signatory_countries LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT treaty_name, ratifying_country, ratification_date FROM treaty_ratifications WHERE foreign_policy_impact = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM international_agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, country_name FROM international_agreements WHERE country_name = 'USA';
SELECT agreement_name, party_name FROM international_agreements INNER JOIN agreement_parties ON international_agreements.agreement_id = agreement_parties.agreement_id;
SELECT * FROM treaty_status ORDER BY last_updated DESC;

SELECT agreement_name, compliance_rating FROM international_agreements INNER JOIN compliance_reports ON international_agreements.agreement_id = compliance_reports.agreement_id WHERE compliance_rating > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM international_agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, country_name FROM international_agreements WHERE country_name = 'USA';
SELECT agreement_name, status FROM international_agreements INNER JOIN treaty_status ON international_agreements.agreement_id = treaty_status.agreement_id;
SELECT party_name, compliance_rating FROM agreement_parties INNER JOIN compliance_reports ON agreement_parties.party_id = compliance_reports.party_id WHERE compliance_rating > 3.5;

SELECT agreement_name, comment_text, commenter_name, comment_date FROM international_agreements LEFT JOIN treaty_comments ON international_agreements.agreement_id = treaty_comments.agreement_id WHERE comment_date > '2022-01-01';
